languages.text: "Сплетение есть кровавый обет, данный мной госпо{mf|дину|же}". {n}Кибелла окунает пальцы в пролитую кровь и чертит символ, похожий на клинок, рассекающий замысловатый узел. Сначала на своем лбу, затем на вашем.{/n}

"The twining is the blood oath I have made to my {mf|lord|lady}." {n}Kibellah dips her fingers in the spilt blood and traces a symbol, first on her own forehead, then on yours. It appears to resemble a blade that is cutting through an intricate knot.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Сплетение есть кровавый обет, данный мной госпо{mf|дину|же}". {n}Кибелла окунает пальцы в пролитую кровь и чертит символ, похожий на клинок, рассекающий замысловатый узел. Сначала на своем лбу, затем на вашем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Tue'ri is a blood oath that I pledge to my {mf|master|mistress}. For 'Tue' is promise. For 'ri' is the demise of {mf|his|her enemies}," {n}Kibellah dips her fingers into the spilled blood and traces a symbol that resembles a blade cutting through an intricate knot first on her forehead and then on yours.{/n}

"Tue'ri is a blood oath that I pledge to my {mf|master|mistress}. For 'Tue' is promise. For 'ri' is the demise of {mf|his|her enemies}," {n}Kibellah dips her fingers into the spilled blood and traces a symbol that resembles a blade cutting through an intricate knot first on her forehead and then on yours.{/n}

"Tue'ri is the blood oath I made to my {mf|master|mistress}. For 'Tue' is a promise. For 'ri' is the demise of {mf|his|her enemies}." {n}Kibellah dips her fingers in the spilled blood and traces a symbol, first on her own forehead, then on yours. It appears to resemble a blade that is cutting through an intricate knot.{/n}

"Tue'ri is the blood oath I made to my {mf|master|mistress}. For 'Tue' is a promise. For 'ri' is the demise of {mf|his|her enemies}." {n}Kibellah dips her fingers in the spilled blood and traces a symbol, first on her own forehead, then on yours. It appears to resemble a blade that is cutting through an intricate knot.{/n}

"The twining is the blood oath I have made to my {mf|lord|lady}." {n}Kibellah dips her fingers in the spilt blood and traces a symbol, first on her own forehead, then on yours. It appears to resemble a blade that is cutting through an intricate knot.{/n}

"The twining is the blood oath I have made to my {mf|lord|lady}." {n}Kibellah dips her fingers in the spilt blood and traces a symbol, first on her own forehead, then on yours. It appears to resemble a blade that is cutting through an intricate knot.{/n}

"The twining is the blood oath I have made to my {mf|lord|lady}." {n}Kibellah dips her fingers in the spilt blood and traces a symbol, first on her own forehead, then on yours. It appears to resemble a blade that is cutting through an intricate knot.{/n}

languages.text: "Die Verbindung ist der Blutschwur, den ich {mf|meinem Herrn|meiner Herrin} geleistet habe." {n}Kibellah taucht ihren Finger in das vergossene Blut und malt ein Symbol auf ihre und deine Stirn. Es scheint eine Klinge darzustellen, die einen komplizierten Knoten durchschneidet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The twining is the blood oath I have made to my {mf|lord|lady}." {n}Kibellah dips her fingers in the spilt blood and traces a symbol, first on her own forehead, then on yours. It appears to resemble a blade that is cutting through an intricate knot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Verbindung ist der Blutschwur, den ich {mf|meinem Herrn|meiner Herrin} geleistet habe." {n}Kibellah taucht ihren Finger in das vergossene Blut und malt ein Symbol auf ihre und deine Stirn. Es scheint eine Klinge darzustellen, die einen komplizierten Knoten durchschneidet.{/n}

"Der Thue'ri ist der Blutschwur, den ich vor {mf|meinem Lord|meiner Lady} abgelegt habe. Denn 'Thue' ist ein Versprechen. Denn 'ri' ist der Untergang {mf|seiner|ihrer} Feinde." {n}Kibellah taucht ihre Finger in das vergossene Blut und malt damit ein Symbol, erst auf ihrer eigenen Stirn, dann auf deiner. Es erinnert an eine Klinge, die einen komplizierten Knoten durchtrennt.{/n}

languages.text: «El entrelazamiento es el juramento de sangre que he realizado a mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Kibellah moja sus dedos en la sangre derramada y traza un símbolo, primero en su frente y después en la tuya. Se asemeja a una daga cortando un nudo complejo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The twining is the blood oath I have made to my {mf|lord|lady}." {n}Kibellah dips her fingers in the spilt blood and traces a symbol, first on her own forehead, then on yours. It appears to resemble a blade that is cutting through an intricate knot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «El entrelazamiento es el juramento de sangre que he realizado a mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Kibellah moja sus dedos en la sangre derramada y traza un símbolo, primero en su frente y después en la tuya. Se asemeja a una daga cortando un nudo complejo.{/n}

«El Thue'ri es el juramento de sangre que he realizado a mi{mf|lord|lady}, pues "Thue" es una promesa y "ri" es la destrucción de sus enemigos». {n}Kibellah moja sus dedos en la sangre derramada y traza un símbolo, primero en su frente y después en la tuya. Se asemeja a una daga cortando un nudo complejo.{/n}

languages.text: 「トワイニングは、我が陛下に交わした血の誓いです」{n}キベラはこぼれた血に指を浸し、まず自分の額に、次にあなたの額にシンボルを描く。それはまるで、絡まった結び目を切り裂く刃のようだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The twining is the blood oath I have made to my {mf|lord|lady}." {n}Kibellah dips her fingers in the spilt blood and traces a symbol, first on her own forehead, then on yours. It appears to resemble a blade that is cutting through an intricate knot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「トワイニングは、我が陛下に交わした血の誓いです」{n}キベラはこぼれた血に指を浸し、まず自分の額に、次にあなたの額にシンボルを描く。それはまるで、絡まった結び目を切り裂く刃のようだった。{/n}
「トゥエリは、私が陛下と交わす血の誓い。『トゥエ』とは約束のこと、『リ』とは陛下の敵を滅ぼすということ」{n}キベラは溜まった血に指を浸し、まず自分の額に、次にこちらの額に、指でシンボルを描く。それは刃のような形で、まるで絡まった結び目を切り裂いているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: “盘绕祭礼是我对主人许下的血誓。”{n}绮贝菈用手指蘸着溅出的鲜血，在自己的额头上画了一个符号，之后将同样的符号也画在了你的额头上。这个符号看起来就像一把匕首正在切开复杂的绳结。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The twining is the blood oath I have made to my {mf|lord|lady}." {n}Kibellah dips her fingers in the spilt blood and traces a symbol, first on her own forehead, then on yours. It appears to resemble a blade that is cutting through an intricate knot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “盘绕祭礼是我对主人许下的血誓。”{n}绮贝菈用手指蘸着溅出的鲜血，在自己的额头上画了一个符号，之后将同样的符号也画在了你的额头上。这个符号看起来就像一把匕首正在切开复杂的绳结。{/n}
“圣狩祭礼是我对主人许下的血誓。这个誓言代表承诺，也代表敌人的覆灭。”{n}绮贝菈用手指蘸着溅出的鲜血，在自己的额头上画了一个符号，之后将同样的符号也画在了你的额头上。这个符号看起来就像一把匕首正在切开复杂的绳结。{/n}

languages.text: « Le jumelage est le pacte de sang que j'ai scellé avec {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}. » {n}Kibellah trempe ses doigts dans le sang versé pour tracer sur son front, puis sur le vôtre, un symbole évoquant une lame tranchant un nœud complexe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The twining is the blood oath I have made to my {mf|lord|lady}." {n}Kibellah dips her fingers in the spilt blood and traces a symbol, first on her own forehead, then on yours. It appears to resemble a blade that is cutting through an intricate knot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Le jumelage est le pacte de sang que j'ai scellé avec {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}. » {n}Kibellah trempe ses doigts dans le sang versé pour tracer sur son front, puis sur le vôtre, un symbole évoquant une lame tranchant un nœud complexe.{/n}

« Le Thue'ri est le pacte de sang que j'ai scellé avec {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}. Car ‘Thue' signifie ‘promesse'. Et ‘ri' désigne l'anéantissement de ses ennemis. » {n}Kibellah trempe ses doigts dans le sang versé pour tracer sur son front, puis sur le vôtre, un symbole évoquant une lame tranchant un nœud complexe.{/n}
